text: @PressSec @TrumpWarRoom @realDonaldTrump Easy now, #BaghdadBarbie.  Blip.  1.4 million Americans applied for unemployment last week.  COVID-19 raging.  Another shutdown is likely.  Facts:  https://t.co/AUDmOmlZS6
